title: [象牙巨塔] [你唔問我答] RiotControlAgent有限的文獻回顧

replies.msg:
返工蛇左去睇紙 依家叫做有d概念
才疏學淺 有錯請講

催淚彈要令人失去反抗能力，靠既就係統稱為RIot Control Agent 既有效成分
依家文獻有提及既RCA主要包括

OC - Oleoresin Capiscum 辣椒樹脂
胡椒噴霧主要成分
CN - Chloroacetophenone 唔識譯
毒性比較大，殘留時間長，依家好似比較少產品會以CN為主要成分
CR - Dibenzoxazapoine 唔識譯
唔太常見，毒性較低，但係殘留時間長
DM - Diphenylaminochloroarsine 唔識譯
主要引致嘔吐，唔符合RCA令人失去反抗力既用途（屌好變態）
CS - Ortho-Chlorobenzylidene Malononitrile 都係唔識譯
毒性唔高，殘留時間唔長，依家一般RCA都會以CS為主要成分

每間廠出既催淚彈成分都會唔同，假設催淚彈廠商唔係特別變態既情況下，CS通常會係現時催淚彈既主要成分。有關RCA既文獻真係好多，短時間睇唔曬，係呢度先限制文獻討論範圍
1：主要討論CS，假設CS相關影響大於其他RCA
2：只討論經皮膚，結膜，呼吸系統，消化系統吸入的CS
3：主要討論臨床研究
4：引用文獻，（盡量）不鳩up

CS基本性質
CS在常溫下為白色晶體，不溶於水但溶於有機溶劑，比空氣重。在作為RCA的過程中CS會被處理成為氣溶劑，在實驗環境下每平方米5微克的濃度已經可以令人無法張開眼睛。具有強力刺激性。

催淚彈與CS的互動
要令CS成為氣溶劑的方法主要有四種
1. 把CS加熱至310攝氏度噴灑於空氣中 （不常用，高熱很危險）
2. 先溶於有機溶劑，再噴灑於空氣中，待溶劑揮發 （不常用，爆炸怎麼辦）
3. 直接使用矽化CS（叫CS1，CS2，請google），噴灑於空氣中（不會自然分解，殘留的影響可以很大）
4. 熱揮發CS （應該比較熱門的做法，而且我個人意見覺得跟港仔的催淚彈mechanics很一致）
文獻提及熱揮發CS的機制：
/粉末狀CS會混合燃料，在燃燒時氣化再condense（仆街唔識打）於空氣中。常見既配方為45%CS，30%KClO3（助燃好似係），14%Epoxy（製做煙霧），10%Anhydride和少量residue（呢到先講聲唔好意思我Chem麻麻，有清識既話可唔可以教me）。熱揮發CS裝置能短時間內把CS加熱至熔點（310攝氏度），產出的CS微粒直徑為0.5至2微米。

題外話，睇番港仔既片確實學到唔小，理論上淋水可以中止放熱反應收個催淚彈皮，而呢度既人或多或少證實左呢個假設。但係請各位小心兩點：
1. 催淚彈的熱力可以引致嚴重燒傷（呢點大家都好清楚）
2. 催淚彈既momentum係非常可怕既
Amnesty International 一篇土耳其Gezi Park衝突既報告中提到（2013年，好撚痴線），警察短距離發射彈頭造成既死傷佔總數六成。 Cases with permanent loss of vision, brain haemorrhage, skull fracture were reported.
當年有個15歲既少年被催淚彈擊中頭部致死（Please google Berkin Elvan），請各位真係小心。

Symptoms of CS exposure （呢部分唔想搞錯所以用返英文唔好意思）
1. Ocular exposure
Conjunctivitis, lacrimation, blepharospasm, itching and erythema of eyelid. Instantaneous conjunctivitis with burning pain sensation usually persist 2 to 5 minutes and resolved abruptly, while conjunctivitis can remain intense for 25 to 30 minutes. Profuse lacrimation can last for 12 to 15 minutes. Photophobia occured in 5 to 10 % of the individuals, and may occur up to an hour.
2. Skin exposure
Skin exposure can result in itching, stinging, redness. A study suggest the burning sensation is attenuated by moisture such as perspiration or lacrimation. The sensation can last for hours and recurred upon. Blistering, vesiculation and allergic contact dermatitis can be resulted from heavy exposure or prolonged contact.
3. Respiratory tract exposure
Respiratory tract exposure often leads to coughing, sneezing, choking, salivation, chest tightness with the feeling of suffocation. Symptoms and signs varied directly with the length of exposure, concentration of CS and the depth of breathing, but usually clear within 10 minutes. Hyperventilating subjects were less tolerable against the exposure. A case report mentioned that respiratory symptoms from CS exposure are exacerbated in hot and humid weather. Relocation to areas with fresh air usually results in recovery in 15 to 30 minutes if the exposure is mild. For intense exposure, the pain from the symptoms can last for several days. Nausea, vomiting and fainting sometimes occur. Raise of intraocular pressure are also reported which can lead to acute glaucoma. The report also stated that CS exposure may lead to pneumonia and pulmonary edema. Development of the edema maybe insidious without the patient being aware. CS exposure may also cause a chronic asthamtic condition called Reactive Airways Dysfunction Syndrome, despite the correlation had not yet proven.
Individuals with asthma or chronic obstructive lung diseases could be vulnerable against CS exposure. From the same article, it is reported that four patients with asthma and two patients with chronic obstructive lung diseases with CS exposure were more seriously affected with prolonged hospitalisations by one week on average. Children and elderly were also more vulnerable against the acute syndromes from CS exposure.

因為CS既性質唔係太ethical，相關既臨床研究資料有限，以上提及既symptoms都係不同的臨床研究報告提出的。未必每人也會有以上symptoms，但以上symptoms曾有出現。CS絕對唔係咩嘢有害氣體證實無害既野，有咩唔舒服，懷疑唔舒服，情緒唔舒服，記得睇醫生

處理CS急性反應
CS比空氣重，在高濃度CS環境下請留在高地。處理受傷既手足時要注意避免二次感染。現在沒有有效處理CS急性反應的方法，避免受傷者情況惡化，保護受傷者安全，舒緩痛楚就好。

1. 避免受傷者情況惡化
1. 把受傷者移到通風地方
2. 避免停留在CS累積的地方，低地
3. 老人，兒童，呼吸系統麻麻既人須多加注意
2. 保護受傷者安全
1. 把受傷者帶離受影響範圍
2. 小心施暴者
3. 舒緩痛楚
1. 現今沒有文獻提出有效方法，通常是用水，生理鹽水等乾淨，無刺激性的液體沖洗受影響地方，爽就好
2. 看到很多人說淋茶淋奶淋antiacid淋babyshampoo能有效減緩痛楚的說法，暫時還看不到有文獻支持相關理論。跟以上一樣，安全和爽就好，奶就真係不了。
記住我地唔係醫生，有咩撚古怪即刻吹雞搵medical help

防禦CS
1. 眼
唔好令CS同眼睛有直接接觸，密氣眼罩能提供有效保護。使用前請先確保氣密。
2. 皮膚
一樣唔好令CS同皮膚有直接接觸（包括頭部）。盡量以衣物包裹全身（包括頭部）。普通衣物的poresize難以完全阻擋CS，但應能提供有限防護
3. 呼吸系統
過濾器能有效阻隔CS微粒。理論上氣密的N95能阻擋大部分的CS微粒，但在field condition下N95未必能維持氣密，而且汗水（其實係油脂）亦會令N95失效，所以N95並非可靠。出面幾多高質post講過濾器，呢度me就唔出黎柒了。外科口罩係保護呼吸系統方面係無用的，但係無得揀既情況下都可以包著塊面既。

再防禦CS
另一樣容易忽略既係二次接觸，CS殘留時間唔長，但短時間亦有殘留影響，曾有文獻提及醫護人員再治療傷患時出現CS接觸症狀，暴露於CS後decontamination（去污染）亦很重要。在安全情況下把曾暴露於CS下的衣服換掉並分開清洗，暫時我未有看到清理CS的相關文獻，反正把受污染的衣物獨立一機幹妳娘洗爆就沒差，反覆清洗後的衣物【應該】是沒有二次CS暴露風險的，擔心或是有其他考慮的話可以把衣服放進膠袋然後丟掉。
換衣服後應該即時沖洗身體，小心清理皮膚表面可能受污染的地方，沖洗後記得不要再接觸可能受污染的衣物。如出現以上提及或無提及的問題請去看醫生，d野擺下擺下可以好撚大獲。

幾篇review 我覺得唔錯，有興趣不妨睇睇
1. Blain, P. G. (2003). Tear gases and irritant incapacitants. 1-chloroacetophenone, 2-chlorobenzylidene malononitrile and dibenz[b,f]-1,4-oxazepine. Toxicol Rev, 22(2), 103-110. Retrieved from https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/1507182
2. Carron, P. N., & Yersin, B. (2009). Management of the effects of exposure to tear gas. BMJ, 338, b2283. doi:10.1136/bmj.b2283
3. Haar RJ, Iacopino V, Ranadive N, et al. Health impacts of chemical irritants used for crowd control: a systematic review of the injuries and deaths caused by tear gas and pepper spray. BMC Public Health. 17:831. 2017
4. Schep, L. J., Slaughter, R. J., & McBride, D. I. (2015). Riot control agents: the tear gases CN, CS and OC-a medical review. J R Army Med Corps, 161(2), 94-99. doi:10.1136/jramc-2013-000165

Reference FYI
1. Alhillo T, Arnaout M, Radhi S, et al. Direct head injury caused by a tear gas cartridge. Question of safety: A case report from Iraq and review of the literature. Journal of clinical Neuroscience. 56 179-182. 2018
2. Craig R, Satyanarayana A, Erik S, Sven-Eric J. Tear gas: an epidemiological and mechanistic reassessment. Annals of the New York Academy of Sciences. 1378:1 96-101. 2016
3. Craig S, Patrick L, Lisa F. Oleoresin Capsicum Spray and In Custody Deaths. The American Journal of Forensic Medicine and Pathology. 16:3 185-192. 1995
4. Epstein RJ, Majmudar RA. Pepper spray in the eye. Ophthalmology. 108:10 1712. 2001
5. Frankenberg L, SÃ¶rbo B. Formation of Cyanide from o-Chlorobenzylidene Malononitrile and Its Toxicological Significance. Archiv fÃ¼r Toxikologie. 31:2 99-108 1973
6. Haar RJ, Iacopino V, Ranadive N, et al. Health impacts of chemical irritants used for crowd control: a systematic review of the injuries and deaths caused by tear gas and pepper spray. BMC Public Health. 17:831. 2017
7. Heinrich U. Possible lethal effect of CS tear gas on Branch Davidians during the FBI raid on the Mount Carmel compound near Waco, Texas on April 19 1933. 2000
8. Holopainen JM, Moilanen JA, Hack T, et al. Toxic carriers in pepper sprays may cause corneal erosion. Toxicology and Applied Pharmacology. 186 155-162. 2003
9. Jason S, James W, James C, et al. Baby Shampoo to Relieve the Discomfort of Tear Gas and Pepper Spray Exposure: A Randomized Controlled Trial. Western Journal of Emergency Medicine. 19:2 294-300. 2018

10. Jonathan F, et al. The Use of Tear Gas in the Republic of korea: A report by Health Professionals. Physicians for Human Rights. 1987
11. Kearney T, Hiatt P, Birdsall E, Smollin C. Pepper spray injury severity: Ten-year case experience of a poison control system. Prehospital Emergency Care. 18 381-386. 2014
12. Kim YJ, Payal AR, Daly MK. Effects of tear gases on the eye. Survey of Ophthalmology. 61:4 434-442 2016
13. Kim-Katz SY, Anserson IB, Kearney TE, et al. Topical antacid therapy for capsaicin-induced dermal pain: a poison center telephone-directed study. American Journal of Emergency Medicine. 28:5 596-602. 2010
14. PubChem. 2-Chlorobenzylidene Malononitrile. https://pubchem.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/compound/2698-41-1 2019.
15. Punte CL, Owens E, Gutentag PJ. Exposure to Ortho-Chlorobenzylidene Malononitrile. Archive of Environmental Health: An international Journal. 6:3 366-374 1963
16. Samy Rengasamy, Adam Miller, Evanly Vo, et al. Filter Performance Degradation of Electrostatic N95 and P100 Filtering Facepiece Respirator by Dioctyl Phthalate Aerosol Loadings. Journal of Engineering Fibers and Fabrics. 8:3 62-69. 2013
17. Sadik T, Gokhan E, John H, Peter C. The Pathology of lethal exposure to the Riot Control Agents: Towards a forensics-based methodology for determining misuse. Journal of Forensic and Legal Medicine. 29 36-42 2015
18. Sanford JP. Medical Aspect of Riot Control Agents. Annual Review of Medicine. 27 421-429 1976
19. Viala B, Blomet J, Mathieu L, Hall AH. Prevention of CS Tear Gas eye and skin effects and active decontamination with Diphoterine: Preliminary studies in 5 French Gendarmes. The Journal of Emergency Medicine. 29:1 5-8 2005
20. 唔想打是但啦有人要再算唔撚信有人會真係睇sad

TL；DR
催淚彈好撚危險，發射催淚彈好撚危險，RCA都好撚危險，要做好保護同去污染。d症狀大部分文獻有記載，咩撚冬瓜豆腐都記得睇醫生。長遠影響過期影響果d文獻上暫時未見到比較可靠既野，有ching見到有不妨擺上黎大家研究下。共勉之。

哎仆街唔記得講埋
受CS影響既地方記得唔撚好掂漂白水
皮膚再受刺激可以好麻煩
唔怕柒繼續推
係開錯台定me碌柒咁
推夠50次算鳩數真係好撚柒
都叫有四個人

replies.msg:
CR - Dibenzoxazapoine - 同CS一樣係催淚彈勁10倍
俾人屌吸死人 毒性比CS低 只係可以長久保留係空間度

CN - Chloroacetophenone - 第二隻催淚彈
比CS毒性高 不過對眼的刺激比較小 只係會咳到爆

DM - Diphenylaminochloroarsine = 亞當氏毒氣
即係嘔吐彈

replies.msg: 唔加自己interpret既野啦
